TextView.android:text: Renewal of GSIS Insurance for All Moving and Fixed Assets Services
Required renewals of insurances/licenses of all moving (heavy equipment, vehicle motorcycles) and buildings for smooth delivery of office programs and services.
All LGU Kitaotao Department/Offices and other offices who are authorized to use Municipal owned moving & fixed
1. One (1) original copy of Duly approved letter request for renewal of Insurance with the following details:\n2. Moving - Plate Number (One (1) photocopy of OR/CR)\n3. Fixed Assets Complete Address
1. Receives notification for the Draft Sheet from GSIS
a. Prepare the GSIS application form, OR, CR and Picture
b. Check the completeness of documents to be submitted
c. Prepare a summary of Insurance Policies for renewal
d. Prepare the Disbursement Voucher (DV) Obligation Request and Status Forms (ORAS)
e. Prepare the monitoring and transmittal forms
2. Wait for the processing of the voucher for payment
a. Endorse the voucher with attached documents of the of the Office of the Municipal Administrator for signature
b. Refer to the Citizen's charter of the office concerned (Signing of ORAS)
d. Office of the Municipal Accountant
g. Preparation of Check by the Municipal Treasurer's Office
Refer to the CTO Citizen's charter
h. Signature of the check by the Municipal Mayor's Office
Refer to the City Administrator's Citizen's charter
i. Releasing of check by the MTO
Refer to the CTO Citizen's charter
j. Claim renewed GSIS insurance policy
3. Received Photocopy of the renewed GSIS insurance policy
a. Photocopy the renewed GSIS insurance policy
b. Release photocopy of the renewed GSIS insurance policy
